title: Jr. QA Tester
text: We are passionate about continuing the development of our staff and always welcoming more talent.

details.point: Publish Posts on various social media channels
Promote content on social networks and monitor engagement (e.g. comments and shares)

requirements.point: At least 5 years of experience in developing and maintaining.
Experience with build tools such as Gulp or Webpack.
Experience code reviewing, leading, and mentoring
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams

responsibilities.point: Debug errors, troubleshoot issues, and perform routine performance optimizations.
Build code pattern libraries, responsive page templates, and single-page web applications from annotated visual designs using Reactjs and Nextjs.
Have great problem-solving skills and you work well in a team.
